It's a shame that the people who are often first in line to protect their city are not offered protection of their own in the form of fair wages & workers' rights. I am proud to support downtown Detroit security officers in their fight for union rights. #OneDetroit #FightFor15 https://twitter.com/SEIU/status/1139209673868021762 QT @SEIU Stand with downtown Detroit security officers like Micah, who are on strike today to protest the retaliation they face for coming together for union rights and at least $15 an hour! #StandForSecurity #OneDetroit @seiulocal1 http://pbs.twimg.com/media/D89Ii6aXkAYv9wL.jpg

All working people have a right to form a union in a fast and fair process. I am proud to support downtown Detroit security officers, who are committed to doing whatever it takes to win union rights and at least $15 an hour. #OneDetroit https://www.detroitnews.com/story/news/local/detroit-city/2019/06/10/downtown-detroit-security-officers-ok-possible-strike/1410692001/

Thank you, @EdOfTheNotch. I’m honored to have your support. https://twitter.com/NH_for_Warren/status/1138933989966798848 QT @NH_for_Warren We’re proud to announce that @EdoftheNotch has endorsed @ewarren!

Thanks for being in this fight with us Ed. We’re thrilled to have you on the team!

RT @RLEspinal I’ve said it before and I’ll say it again, @BernieSanders is the best person to move our city and country forward. Proud to join @BernieSanders campaign for 2020. Who’s with us? http://pbs.twimg.com/media/D8-cByXXYAMolZp.jpg

As we commemorate the 30th anniversary of #JusticeforJanitors, let's remember the fight for worker equality is alive today and needs our support. I stand with #OneDetroit and the downtown security officers. We must stand together with workers to hold corporations accountable.

NEWS: My resolution condemning the anti-Semitic attack at the Chabad of Poway Synagogue just passed. Anti-Semitism—and all forms of bigotry—have no place in our country. Glad we came together today to honor the victims, and speak out against white nationalism & white supremacy.

Yesterday I offered an amendment to allow Fed researchers to study Schedule I Drugs, incl:
- MDMA & PTSD 
- Psilocybin & severe depression
- Ibogaine & opioid withdrawal

🚨 House votes TODAY.

If you’re supportive, CALL YOUR REP. Don’t assume they’ll vote for it - let them know. https://twitter.com/tomangell/status/1139163673111486466 QT @tomangell WATCH: Congress debated @AOC’s amendment to remove barriers to researching Schedule I drugs like like psilocybin, MDMA and marijuana early this morning.

A vote is coming later today…

https://www.marijuanamoment.net/congress-debates-aoc-amendment-to-make-it-easier-to-study-psychedelic-drugs/ http://pbs.twimg.com/media/D88fQcEXoAY7e4R.jpg

My executive actions will protect over 6 million immigrants from deportation and provide a path to citizenship for Dreamers. We can’t let them continue to live their lives in fear.

https://kamalaharris.org/Dreamers

This #PrideMonth, we must recommit to lifting up the voices of LGBTQ+ Americans and fighting on behalf of those who face discrimination because of who they are and who they love. That's why I joined my colleagues in a Senate resolution to celebrate our LGBTQ+ community.

The Russians attacked our elections, and @realDonaldTrump is giving them the green light to do it again. We can’t stand by and just hope for the best. The Senate must join the House in passing #HR1 to #ProtectOurDemocracy! https://twitter.com/ZekeJMiller/status/1138937930804846592 QT @ZekeJMiller Trump tells ABC that if a foreign government has information on one of his 2020 opponents, "I think I'd want to hear it"

The President of the United States has a duty to defend our democracy. This is a clear signal to our foreign adversaries that he won't.

The Senate must pass election security legislation. We have a national security threat in the White House and this can't wait any longer. https://twitter.com/ABC/status/1138936855573999616 QT @ABC EXCLUSIVE: Pres. Trump tells @GStephanopoulos he wouldn't necessarily alert the FBI if approached by foreign figures with information on his 2020 opponent: "It’s not an interference. They have information. I think I’d take it." https://trib.al/wGVRHif http://pbs.twimg.com/amplify_video_thumb/1138931265032413184/img/DUPofhHFxeZtZ_nJ.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1138931265032413184/vid/320x320/9QWWKza8Xi7IolHD.mp4?tag=13
